location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的计划单列市，中国四大一线城市之一、粤港澳大湾区的中心城市之一、中国超大城市之一。深圳因改革开放而高速发展，由边陲农业县跃升为全国一线城市。
description.en: A sub-provincial city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It is one of the four first-tier cities in China, a central city in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, and one of China's megacities. Shenzhen has developed rapidly due to the reform and opening-up, transforming from a border agricultural county into a national first-tier city.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中共深圳市委书记。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Secretary of the CPC Shenzhen Municipal Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党深圳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党深圳市委员会
en: Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在深圳市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任深圳市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 深圳市的国家权力机关。
description.en: The state power organ of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任深圳市人民政府市长。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Mayor of the Shenzhen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 深圳市的行政机关。
description.en: The administrative organ of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会主席。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Chairwoman of the Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在深圳市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 深圳市的前身，历史上的行政区划。
description.en: The predecessor of Shenzhen, a historical administrative division.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国第一个经济特区。
description.en: The first Special Economic Zone in China.

description.zh-cn: 1978年中共十一届三中全会后，中国开始实行的的经济改革和对外开放政策。
description.en: The economic reform and opening-up policy implemented by China since the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国改革开放和现代化建设的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, and the chief architect of China's reform, opening-up, and modernization.

description.zh-cn: 东晋第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Eastern Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中国国民党创始人，中华民国国父。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, statesman, and founding father of the Republic of China. He is the founder of the Kuomintang (KMT).

description.zh-cn: 1900年孙中山领导的旨在推翻清朝的武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising led by Sun Yat-sen in 1900 aimed at overthrowing the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共广东省委第一书记，是经济特区事业的重要推动者之一。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former First Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, and a key promoter of the Special Economic Zones.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，深圳蛇口工业区的创办者。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, founder of the Shekou Industrial Zone in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家由企业创办的股份制商业银行。
description.en: The first joint-stock commercial bank in the People's Republic of China founded by an enterprise.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构。
description.en: The first commercial insurance institution in the People's Republic of China founded by an enterprise.

description.zh-cn: 1992年初邓小平视察中国南方城市并发表重要讲话的事件，对中国的经济改革和市场发展产生了深远影响。
description.en: An event in early 1992 where Deng Xiaoping inspected southern Chinese cities and delivered important speeches, which had a profound impact on China's economic reforms and market development.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的两个证券交易所之一，是中国企业重要的融资平台。
description.en: One of the two stock exchanges in mainland China, serving as an important financing platform for Chinese enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月20日发生于深圳市光明新区（现光明区）的重大安全事故。
description.en: A major safety accident that occurred on December 20, 2015, in Guangming New Area (now Guangming District), Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 深圳市下辖的市辖区。
description.en: A municipal district under the jurisdiction of Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: The core of the fifth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, currently serving as the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任深圳市人民政府市长，后因受贿罪被判处死缓。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Mayor of Shenzhen, who was later sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任深圳市副市长，后因严重违纪并涉嫌犯罪被开除党籍并移送司法机关。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Vice Mayor of Shenzhen, who was later expelled from the party and transferred to judicial organs for serious disciplinary violations and suspected crimes.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，腾讯公司主要创办人之一。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur, one of the main founders of Tencent.

description.zh-cn: 中国一家跨国企业控股公司，为中国最大的互联网综合服务提供商之一。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate holding company, and one of the largest internet integrated service providers in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，华为技术有限公司主要创始人兼总裁。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur, the founder and CEO of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 全球领先的信息与通信技术解决方案供应商。
description.en: A leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，顺丰控股创始人。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur, the founder of SF Holding.

description.zh-cn: 中国领先的快递物流综合服务商。
description.en: A leading integrated express logistics service provider in China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党深圳市委员会
中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 深圳市在原宝安县的基础上设立。
description.en: Shenzhen was established on the basis of the original Bao'an County.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 批准在深圳设置中国第一个经济特区。
description.en: Approved the establishment of China's first Special Economic Zone in Shenzhen.

description.zh-cn: 深圳因改革开放政策而得以建立并高速发展。
description.en: Shenzhen was established and developed rapidly due to the Reform and Opening-up policy.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十一届三中全会后成为实际最高领导人，并开启了改革开放。
description.en: Became the de facto supreme leader after the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC and initiated the Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 于东晋咸和六年（331年）分南海郡地，设置宝安县。
description.en: In the sixth year of the Xianhe era of the Eastern Jin Dynasty (331 AD), he divided the Nanhai Commandery and established Bao'an County.

description.zh-cn: 于1900年在三洲田村一带发动起义。
description.en: Launched an uprising in the Sanzhoutian area in 1900.

position.zh-cn: 中共广东省委第一书记
position.en: First Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee

description.zh-cn: 时任广东省委第一书记的习仲勋向邓小平汇报并请求中央支持建立特区，邓小平表示支持并指示“你们自己去搞，杀出一条血路来”。
description.en: As the First Secretary of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee, Xi Zhongxun reported to Deng Xiaoping and requested central support for establishing the special zone. Deng Xiaoping expressed his support and instructed them to 'carve out a path for yourselves'.

description.zh-cn: 首次视察深圳，肯定了“深圳速度”及经济特区的发展模式。
description.en: Inspected Shenzhen for the first time, affirming the 'Shenzhen Speed' and the development model of the Special Economic Zone.

description.zh-cn: 在袁庚等人的推动下，招商银行于1987年在深圳蛇口成立。
description.en: Under the promotion of Yuan Geng and others, China Merchants Bank was established in Shekou, Shenzhen in 1987.

description.zh-cn: 在袁庚等人的推动下，平安保险（中国平安）于1988年在深圳蛇口成立。
description.en: Under the promotion of Yuan Geng and others, Ping An Insurance (Ping An of China) was established in Shekou, Shenzhen in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平南巡及其讲话拯救了中国新兴的资本市场及深圳证券交易所。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's Southern Tour and his speeches saved China's emerging capital market and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 在光明新区（现光明区）凤凰社区红坳村发生大规模土石崩塌事故，造成73人死亡、4人失踪。
description.en: A large-scale landslide occurred in Hongao Village, Fenghuang Community, Guangming New Area (now Guangming District), causing 73 deaths and 4 missing persons.

description.zh-cn: 在深圳经济特区建立40周年庆祝大会上出席并发表讲话，勉励深圳继续坚持改革开放。
description.en: Attended and delivered a speech at the celebration of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of the Shenzhen Special Economic Zone, encouraging Shenzhen to continue its reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 以受贿罪，判处原深圳市长许宗衡死刑，缓期两年执行。
description.en: Sentenced former Shenzhen mayor Xu Zongheng to death with a two-year reprieve for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 通报梁道行严重违纪并涉嫌犯罪，决定给予其开除党籍处分，并移送司法机关依法处理。
description.en: Announced that Liang Daoxing had committed serious disciplinary violations and was suspected of crimes, decided to expel him from the party, and transferred his case to judicial organs for handling according to the law.

description.zh-cn: 马化腾是腾讯公司的主要创办人之一。
description.en: Ma Huateng is one of the main founders of Tencent.

description.zh-cn: 任正非是华为技术有限公司的主要创始人。
description.en: Ren Zhengfei is the main founder of Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 王卫是顺丰控股的创始人。
description.en: Wang Wei is the founder of SF Holding.
